query:
WITH filtered_data AS (
                SELECT *
                FROM carts 
                WHERE owner_id = $3
                LIMIT $1
                OFFSET $2
            ), 
            total_count AS (
                SELECT COUNT(id) AS total_rows
                FROM carts
            )
            SELECT JSONB_BUILD_OBJECT(
                'data', JSONB_AGG(ROW_TO_JSON(filtered_data)),
                'total', (SELECT total_rows FROM total_count)
            ) AS result
            FROM filtered_data;
